jobDescription: About Aurum Consulting EngineersAurum Consulting Engineers, a leading Bay Area and Central Coast electrical engineering firm that focuses primarily on electrical engineering ranging from Commercial, Education, Health Care and Government projects.Position Summary:Electrical Designer is the entry level of professional work requiring a bachelor’s degree in engineering and no experience, or the equivalent of a degree in appropriate education and experience.Duties & Responsibilities:Plan, organize and manage projects.Ability to manage multiple projects.Ensures that projects meet budget constraints and meet client deadlines.Stay current with California Electrical Code, Fire Code and Building Code.Visits jobsites to verify existing job conditions and to verify jobs are built per plans and specifications.Utility coordination and paperwork submittal.Coordinate work with architect and other trades (mechanical, civil, structural, etc.)Manage and perform the estimating for potential Commercial, Educational, Institutional, Residential projects.Design of low and medium voltage distribution.Design power and lighting layouts per the client’s direction.Layout fire alarm devices per the National Fire Code.Review all submittals to verify specifications are met.Responsible for project scope and design.Responsible of the quality of design.Respond immediately to project problems and anticipate future problems.Required Education and/or Experience:Electrical Engineering or similar Bachelor of Science degree or in progress.Proficient MS Word & Excel, AutoCAD and Revit a plus.LEED, EIT preferred.Good time management, communication and people skills.Excellent written and verbal communication skills.Self-starter and able to work with minimal supervision.We offer competitive salary, benefits package, retirement plan, a dynamic work environment and a chance to grow professionally. Please email resume to najib@acemb.com
